The_DT accounting_NN treatment_NN Deferred_JJ tax_NN amounts_NNS are_VBP not_RB discounted_VBN ._.
for_IN these_DT instruments_NNS is_VBZ dependent_JJ upon_IN whether_IN they_PRP are_VBP entered_VBN into_IN for_IN trading_NN or_CC non-trading_JJ hedging_NN purposes_NNS ._.
11_CD Debt_NN securities_NNS and_CC equity_NN shares_NNS Debt_NNP securities_NNS and_CC equity_NN shares_NNS intended_VBN for_IN use_NN on_IN a_DT Trading_NN continuing_VBG basis_NN in_IN the_DT Groups_NNS activities_NNS are_VBP classified_VBN as_IN Derivatives_NNS held_VBN for_IN trading_NN purposes_NNS are_VBP recognized_VBN in_IN the_DT investment_NN securities_NNS and_CC are_VBP stated_VBN at_IN cost_NN less_JJR provision_NN for_IN accounts_NNS at_IN fair_JJ value_NN ._.
Gains_NNS or_CC losses_NNS arising_VBG from_IN changes_NNS in_IN 142_CD any_DT permanent_JJ diminution_NN in_IN value_NN ._.
The_DT cost_NN of_IN dated_JJ fair_JJ value_NN are_VBP included_VBN in_IN dealing_VBG profits_NNS in_IN the_DT consolidated_JJ investment_NN securities_NNS is_VBZ adjusted_VBN for_IN the_DT amortisation_NN of_IN profit_NN and_CC loss_NN account_NN ._.
Fair_NNP value_NN is_VBZ based_VBN on_IN quoted_VBN market_NN premiums_NNS or_CC discounts_NNS over_IN periods_NNS to_TO redemption_NN and_CC the_DT prices_NNS ._.
Where_WRB representative_JJ market_NN prices_NNS are_VBP not_RB available_JJ ,_, amortisation_NN is_VBZ included_VBN in_IN interest_NN receivable_NN ._.
Other_JJ debt_NN the_DT fair_JJ value_NN is_VBZ determined_VBN from_IN current_JJ market_NN information_NN securities_NNS and_CC equity_NN shares_NNS are_VBP carried_VBN at_IN fair_JJ value_NN ,_, with_IN using_VBG appropriate_JJ pricing_NN or_CC valuation_NN models_NNS ._.
Adjustments_NNS are_VBP changes_NNS in_IN fair_JJ value_NN recognized_VBN in_IN the_DT profit_NN and_CC loss_NN account_NN ._.
made_VBN to_TO quoted_VBN market_NN prices_NNS where_WRB appropriate_JJ to_TO cover_VB credit_NN risk_NN ,_, liquidity_NN risk_NN and_CC future_JJ operational_JJ costs_NNS ._.
In_IN the_DT 12_CD Shares_NNS in_IN subsidiary_NN undertakings_NNS consolidated_JJ balance_NN sheet_NN ,_, positive_JJ fair_JJ values_NNS assets_NNS of_IN The_DT companys_NNS shares_NNS in_IN subsidiary_NN undertakings_NNS are_VBP stated_VBN in_IN trading_NN derivatives_NNS are_VBP included_VBN in_IN Other_JJ assets_NNS and_CC negative_JJ the_DT balance_NN sheet_NN of_IN the_DT company_NN at_IN directors_NNS valuation_NN that_WDT fair_JJ values_NNS liabilities_NNS in_IN Other_JJ liabilities_NNS ._.
Positive_JJ and_CC negative_JJ takes_VBZ account_NN of_IN the_DT subsidiary_NN undertakings_NNS net_JJ asset_NN values_NNS ._.
fair_JJ values_NNS of_IN trading_NN derivatives_NNS are_VBP offset_VBN where_WRB the_DT contracts_NNS have_VBP been_VBN entered_VBN into_IN under_IN master_NN netting_VBG agreements_NNS or_CC other_JJ 13_CD Tangible_JJ fixed_JJ assets_NNS arrangements_NNS that_WDT give_VBP a_DT legally_RB enforceable_JJ right_NN of_IN set-off_NN ._.
Freehold_NNP and_CC long_JJ leasehold_NN properties_NNS are_VBP revalued_VBN on_IN a_DT rolling_VBG basis_NN ,_, each_DT property_NN being_VBG revalued_VBN at_IN least_JJS every_DT five_CD Non-trading_JJ years_NNS ._.
Other_JJ tangible_JJ fixed_JJ assets_NNS are_VBP stated_VBN at_IN cost_NN less_JJR Non-trading_JJ derivatives_NNS are_VBP entered_VBN into_IN by_IN the_DT Group_NNP to_TO hedge_VB depreciation_NN and_CC provisions_NNS for_IN impairment_NN ._.
Costs_NNS of_IN adapting_VBG exposures_NNS arising_VBG from_IN transactions_NNS entered_VBD into_IN in_IN the_DT normal_JJ premises_NNS for_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN the_DT Group_NNP are_VBP separately_RB identified_VBN and_CC course_NN of_IN banking_NN activities_NNS ._.
They_PRP are_VBP recognized_VBN in_IN the_DT depreciated_VBN ._.
accounts_NNS in_IN accordance_NN with_IN the_DT accounting_NN treatment_NN of_IN the_DT underlying_VBG transaction_NN or_CC transactions_NNS being_VBG hedged_VBN ._.
To_TO be_VB Tangible_JJ fixed_JJ assets_NNS are_VBP depreciated_VBN to_TO their_PRP$ residual_JJ value_NN classified_VBN as_IN non-trading_JJ ,_, a_DT derivative_JJ must_MD match_VB or_CC eliminate_VB over_IN their_PRP$ estimated_VBN useful_JJ economic_JJ lives_NNS on_IN a_DT straight-line_JJ the_DT risk_NN inherent_JJ in_IN the_DT hedged_VBN item_NN from_IN potential_JJ movements_NNS in_IN basis_NN ,_, as_IN follows_VBZ :_: interest_NN rates_NNS ,_, exchange_NN rates_NNS or_CC market_NN values_NNS ._.
In_IN addition_NN ,_, there_EX must_MD be_VB a_DT demonstrable_JJ link_NN to_TO an_DT underlying_JJ transaction_NN ,_, pool_NN Freehold_NNP and_CC long_JJ leasehold_NN buildings_NNS 50_CD years_NNS of_IN transactions_NNS or_CC specified_VBN future_JJ transaction_NN or_CC transactions_NNS ._.

In_IN the_DT the_DT lease_NN event_NN that_IN a_DT non-trading_JJ derivative_JJ transaction_NN is_VBZ terminated_VBN or_CC Property_NN adaptation_NN costs_VBZ 10_CD to_TO 15_CD years_NNS ceases_VBZ to_TO be_VB an_DT effective_JJ hedge_NN ,_, the_DT derivative_NN is_VBZ re-measured_JJ Computer_NN equipment_NN up_IN to_TO 5_CD years_NNS at_IN fair_JJ value_NN and_CC any_DT resulting_JJ profit_NN or_CC loss_NN amortised_VBN over_IN the_DT Other_JJ equipment_NN 4_CD to_TO 15_CD years_NNS remaining_VBG life_NN of_IN the_DT underlying_VBG transaction_NN or_CC transactions_NNS being_VBG hedged_VBN ._.
If_IN a_DT hedged_VBN item_NN is_VBZ derecognised_VBN ,_, or_CC a_DT specified_JJ future_JJ transaction_NN is_VBZ no_RB longer_RBR likely_JJ to_TO occur_VB ,_, the_DT Assets_NNS on_IN operating_VBG leases_NNS are_VBP depreciated_VBN over_IN their_PRP$ related_JJ non-trading_JJ derivative_NN is_VBZ remeasured_VBN at_IN fair_JJ value_NN and_CC estimated_VBN useful_JJ lives_NNS on_IN a_DT straight-line_JJ or_CC reverse-annuity_JJ basis_NN ._.
Land_NNP has_VBZ an_DT unlimited_JJ life_NN and_CC is_VBZ not_RB depreciated_VBN ._.
the_DT resulting_VBG profit_NN or_CC loss_NN taken_VBN to_TO the_DT profit_NN and_CC loss_NN account_NN ._.
15_CD Sale_NNP and_CC repurchase_VBD transactions_NNS Investment_NN properties_NNS are_VBP revalued_VBN annually_RB to_TO open_VB market_NN Securities_NNS which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN sold_VBN with_IN an_DT agreement_NN to_TO value_NN ._.
No_DT depreciation_NN is_VBZ charged_VBN on_IN freehold_NN investment_NN repurchase_VBD continue_VBP to_TO be_VB shown_VBN on_IN the_DT balance_NN sheet_NN and_CC properties_NNS ,_, in_IN accordance_NN with_IN the_DT requirements_NNS of_IN Statement_NN of_IN Standard_NNP Accounting_NNP Practice_NNP 19_CD Accounting_NN for_IN investment_NN the_DT sale_NN proceeds_VBZ recorded_VBN as_IN a_DT deposit_NN ._.
This_DT is_VBZ a_DT departure_NN from_IN the_DT requirements_NNS of_IN the_DT in_IN reverse_JJ sale_NN and_CC repurchase_VBD transactions_NNS are_VBP not_RB recognized_VBN in_IN the_DT balance_NN sheet_NN and_CC the_DT purchase_NN price_NN is_VBZ Companies_NNP Act_NNP 1985_CD which_WDT requires_VBZ all_DT tangible_JJ fixed_JJ assets_NNS to_TO treated_VBN as_IN a_DT loan_NN ._.
The_DT difference_NN between_IN the_DT sale_NN price_NN and_CC be_VB depreciated_VBN ._.
Investment_NN properties_NNS are_VBP held_VBN not_RB for_IN repurchase_NN price_NN is_VBZ accrued_VBN evenly_RB over_IN the_DT life_NN of_IN the_DT consumption_NN but_CC for_IN investment_NN and_CC the_DT directors_NNS consider_VBP that_IN to_TO depreciate_VB them_PRP would_MD not_RB give_VB a_DT true_JJ and_CC fair_JJ view_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ not_RB transaction_NN and_CC charged_VBN or_CC credited_VBN to_TO the_DT profit_NN and_CC loss_NN practicable_JJ to_TO assess_VB estimated_VBN useful_JJ lives_NNS for_IN investment_NN account_NN as_IN interest_NN payable_JJ or_CC receivable_JJ ._.
properties_NNS ,_, and_CC accordingly_RB the_DT effect_NN of_IN not_RB depreciating_VBG them_PRP can_MD not_RB be_VB reasonably_RB quantified_VBN ._.

A_DT substantial_JJ proportion_NN of_IN such_JJ reserves_NNS are_VBP required_VBN to_TO be_VB retained_VBN by_IN the_DT overseas_JJ undertakings_NNS to_TO meet_VB local_JJ regulatory_JJ requirements_NNS ._.
2_CD Deferred_JJ tax_NN assets_NNS of_IN 110_CD million_CD 2003_CD 127_CD million_CD resulting_VBG from_IN tax_NN losses_NNS carried_VBD forward_RB have_VB not_RB been_VBN recognized_VBN as_IN there_EX is_VBZ insufficient_JJ evidence_NN that_IN the_DT asset_NN will_MD be_VB recoverable_JJ ._.
These_DT assets_NNS may_MD be_VB recoverable_JJ if_IN the_DT losses_NNS can_MD be_VB offset_VBN against_IN suitable_JJ future_JJ taxable_JJ profits_NNS arising_VBG in_IN the_DT same_JJ tax_NN jurisdiction_NN ._.
3_CD The_DT fair_JJ values_NNS of_IN certain_JJ financial_JJ assets_NNS are_VBP disclosed_VBN in_IN Note_NN 40_CD ._.
The_DT tax_NN that_WDT could_MD be_VB payable_JJ if_IN these_DT assets_NNS were_VBD disposed_VBN of_IN section_NN at_IN the_DT values_NNS shown_VBN is_VBZ estimated_VBN at_IN 910_CD million_CD 2003_CD 561_CD million_CD ._.
Because_IN of_IN the_DT nature_NN of_IN these_DT financial_JJ assets_NNS which_WDT are_VBP held_VBN 03_CD as_IN part_NN of_IN the_DT banking_NN business_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ not_RB possible_JJ to_TO determine_VB the_DT amount_NN that_WDT may_MD become_VB payable_JJ in_IN the_DT foreseeable_JJ future_NN ._.
4_CD Freehold_NNP and_CC long_JJ leasehold_NN properties_NNS are_VBP revalued_VBN see_VBP Note_VB 20_CD ._.
No_DT provision_NN has_VBZ been_VBN made_VBN for_IN deferred_JJ tax_NN on_IN gains_NNS recognized_VBN on_IN revaluing_VBG Group_NNP properties_NNS except_IN where_WRB there_EX is_VBZ a_DT commitment_NN to_TO sell_VB the_DT asset_NN and_CC any_DT taxable_JJ gain_NN will_MD not_RB be_VB subject_JJ to_TO rollover_NN relief_NN ._.

These_DT are_VBP used_VBN to_TO provide_VB financial_JJ obligation_NN ,_, on_IN the_DT buyer_NN to_TO receive_VB or_CC pay_VB a_DT specific_JJ quantity_NN of_IN services_NNS to_TO customers_NNS and_CC to_TO take_VB ,_, hedge_VB and_CC modify_VB positions_NNS an_DT asset_NN or_CC financial_JJ instrument_NN for_IN a_DT specified_VBN price_NN at_IN or_CC as_IN part_NN of_IN trading_NN activities_NNS ._.

Options_NNS may_MD be_VB exchange_NN traded_VBN or_CC or_CC modify_VB risk_NN exposures_NNS arising_VBG on_IN the_DT balance_NN sheet_NN from_IN a_DT OTC_NNP agreements_NNS ._.
The_DT Group_NNP principally_RB buys_VBZ and_CC sells_VBZ variety_NN of_IN activities_NNS including_VBG lending_NN and_CC securities_NNS investment_NN ._.
currency_NN and_CC interest_NN rate_NN options_NNS ._.
The_DT principal_JJ types_NNS of_IN derivative_JJ contracts_NNS into_IN which_WDT the_DT Futures_NNPS and_CC forwards_RB Group_NNP enters_VBZ are_VBP described_VBN below_IN ._.
Short-term_JJ interest_NN rate_NN futures_NNS ,_, bond_NN futures_NNS and_CC forward_RB foreign_JJ exchange_NN contracts_NNS are_VBP all_DT agreements_NNS to_TO deliver_VB ,_, or_CC Swaps_NNS take_VBP delivery_NN of_IN ,_, a_DT specified_VBN amount_NN of_IN an_DT asset_NN or_CC financial_JJ These_DT are_VBP over-the-counter_JJ OTC_NNP agreements_NNS between_IN two_CD instrument_NN based_VBN on_IN the_DT specified_VBN rate_NN ,_, price_NN or_CC index_NN applied_VBD parties_NNS to_TO exchange_VB periodic_JJ payments_NNS of_IN interest_NN ,_, or_CC against_IN the_DT underlying_JJ asset_NN or_CC financial_JJ instrument_NN ,_, at_IN a_DT payments_NNS for_IN the_DT change_NN in_IN value_NN of_IN a_DT commodity_NN ,_, or_CC related_VBN specified_JJ date_NN ._.
Futures_NNS are_VBP exchange_NN traded_VBN at_IN standardised_JJ index_NN ,_, over_IN a_DT set_NN period_NN based_VBN on_IN notional_JJ principal_JJ amounts_NNS ._.
amounts_NNS of_IN the_DT underlying_JJ asset_NN or_CC financial_JJ instrument_NN ._.
The_DT Group_NNP enters_VBZ into_IN swap_NN transactions_NNS in_IN several_JJ markets_NNS ._.
Forward_RB contracts_NNS are_VBP OTC_NNP agreements_NNS and_CC are_VBP principally_RB Interest_NN rate_NN swaps_NNS exchange_NN fixed_VBN rates_NNS for_IN floating_VBG rates_NNS of_IN dealt_VBN in_IN by_IN the_DT Group_NNP in_IN interest_NN rates_NNS as_IN forward_JJ rate_NN agreements_NNS interest_NN based_VBN on_IN notional_JJ amounts_NNS ._.
Basis_NN swaps_NNS exchange_NN and_CC in_IN currency_NN as_IN forward_RB foreign_JJ exchange_NN contracts_NNS ._.
floating_VBG or_CC fixed_VBN interest_NN calculated_VBN using_VBG different_JJ bases_NNS ._.
Cross_NNP currency_NN swaps_NNS are_VBP the_DT exchange_NN of_IN interest_NN based_VBN on_IN notional_JJ Collateral_NNP values_NNS of_IN different_JJ currencies_NNS ._.
Equity_NN and_CC commodity_NN swaps_NNS The_DT Group_NNP may_MD require_VB collateral_NN in_IN respect_NN of_IN the_DT credit_NN risk_NN in_IN exchange_NN interest_NN for_IN the_DT return_NN on_IN an_DT equity_NN or_CC commodity_NN ,_, or_CC derivative_JJ transactions_NNS ._.
The_DT amount_NN of_IN credit_NN risk_NN is_VBZ principally_RB equity_NN or_CC commodity_NN index_NN ._.
the_DT positive_JJ fair_JJ value_NN of_IN contracts_NNS ._.

counterparty_NN are_VBP aggregated_VBN into_IN a_DT single_JJ item_NN where_WRB there_EX is_VBZ a_DT right_NN to_TO insist_VB on_IN net_JJ settlement_NN and_CC the_DT debit_NN balance_NN matures_VBZ no_RB later_RB than_IN the_DT credit_NN balance_NN ._.

section_NN 03_CD Annual_JJ Report_NNP and_CC Accounts_NNPS 2004_CD Notes_NNS on_IN the_DT accounts_NNS Financial_JJ statements_NNS RBS_NNP Annual_JJ Report_NNP 136-199_CD 7_CD 3_CD 05_CD 11:16_CD am_VBP Page_NNP 194_CD Notes_NNS on_IN the_DT accounts_NNS continued_VBD 53_CD Significant_JJ differences_NNS between_IN UK_NNP and_CC US_NNP generally_RB accepted_VBD accounting_NN principles_NNS continued_VBD Cash_NN flow_NN statements_NNS There_EX are_VBP many_JJ similarities_NNS between_IN SFAS_NNP 95_CD ,_, Statement_NN of_IN Cash_NNP Flows_NNP as_IN amended_VBN by_IN SFAS_NNP 104_CD Statement_NN of_IN Cash_NNP Flows_NNP Net_JJ Reporting_NNP of_IN Certain_NNP Cash_NNP Receipts_NNPS and_CC Cash_NNP Payments_NNS and_CC Classification_NN of_IN Cash_NNP Flows_NNP from_IN Hedging_NNP Transactions_NNS ,_, and_CC FRS_NNP 1_CD Cash_NNP Flow_NNP Statements_NNP Revised_VBN ._.

section_NN 04_CD Annual_JJ Report_NNP and_CC Accounts_NNPS 2004_CD Additional_JJ information_NN Additional_JJ information_NN RBS_NNP Annual_JJ Report_NNP 200-220_CD 7_CD 3_CD 05_CD 11:18_CD am_VBP Page_NNP 214_CD Additional_JJ information_NN continued_VBD Off_IN balance_NN sheet_NN arrangements_NNS As_IN financial_JJ intermediary_JJ ,_, the_DT Group_NNP arranges_VBZ securitisations_NNS of_IN The_DT Group_NNP is_VBZ involved_VBN with_IN several_JJ types_NNS of_IN off-balance_JJ sheet_NN client_NN assets_NNS ._.
These_DT include_VBP multi-seller_JJ commercial_JJ paper_NN arrangements_NNS ,_, including_VBG special_JJ purpose_NN vehicles_NNS ,_, lending_VBG conduits_NNS and_CC client_NN intermediation_NN transactions_NNS ._.
The_DT Group_NNP has_VBZ commitments_NNS and_CC financial_JJ guarantees_NNS ._.
established_VBN a_DT number_NN of_IN SPVs_NNS to_TO act_VB as_IN commercial_JJ paper_NN conduits_NNS ._.
These_DT allow_VBP customers_NNS to_TO access_NN liquidity_NN in_IN the_DT Special_JJ purpose_NN vehicles_NNS SPVs_NNS commercial_JJ paper_NN market_NN by_IN selling_VBG assets_NNS to_TO the_DT conduit_NN that_WDT SPVs_NNS are_VBP vehicles_NNS set_VBN up_RP for_IN a_DT specific_JJ ,_, limited_JJ purpose_NN ,_, do_VBP not_RB funds_NNS the_DT purchase_NN by_IN issuing_VBG commercial_JJ paper_NN to_TO third_JJ carry_VBP out_RP a_DT business_NN or_CC trade_NN and_CC typically_RB have_VBP no_DT employees_NNS ._.
The_DT Group_NNP supplies_NNS certain_JJ services_NNS and_CC contingent_JJ They_PRP take_VBP a_DT variety_NN of_IN legal_JJ forms_NNS trusts_NNS ,_, partnerships_NNS and_CC liquidity_NN support_NN to_TO some_DT or_CC all_DT of_IN these_DT vehicles_NNS on_IN an_DT arms_NNS companies_NNS and_CC fulfil_VBP many_JJ different_JJ functions_NNS ._.
They_PRP constitute_VBP length_NN basis_NN as_RB well_RB as_IN program_NN credit_NN enhancement_NN ._.
Other_JJ 214_CD a_DT key_JJ element_NN of_IN securitisation_NN transactions_NNS in_IN which_WDT an_DT SPV_NNP client_NN securitisations_NNS arranged_VBN by_IN the_DT Group_NNP involve_VBP individual_JJ acquires_VBZ financial_JJ assets_NNS funded_VBN by_IN the_DT issue_NN of_IN securities_NNS ._.

The_DT Group_NNP may_MD act_VB In_IN the_DT normal_JJ course_NN of_IN business_NN ,_, the_DT Group_NNP arranges_VBZ as_IN advisor_NN to_TO the_DT manager_NN of_IN the_DT SPV_NNP and_CC provide_VB liquidity_NN securitisations_NNS to_TO facilitate_VB client_NN transactions_NNS and_CC undertakes_VBZ facilities_NNS to_TO it_PRP ._.
securitisations_NNS to_TO sell_VB financial_JJ assets_NNS or_CC to_TO obtain_VB funding_NN ._.
It_PRP has_VBZ established_VBN a_DT number_NN of_IN SPVs_NNS to_TO act_VB as_IN commercial_JJ paper_NN Under_IN UK_NNP GAAP_NNP the_DT Group_NNP accounts_NNS for_IN fees_NNS received_VBN from_IN conduits_NNS for_IN customers_NNS ._.
SPVs_NNS are_VBP also_RB utilised_VBN in_IN its_PRP$ fund_NN client_NN securitisations_NNS in_IN line_NN with_IN its_PRP$ usual_JJ policy_NN for_IN similar_JJ fees_NNS management_NN activities_NNS to_TO structure_VB investment_NN funds_NNS to_TO which_WDT from_IN other_JJ banking_NN activities_NNS ._.
Undrawn_JJ liquidity_NN lines_NNS are_VBP the_DT Group_NNP provides_VBZ investment_NN management_NN services_NNS ._.
included_VBN within_IN undrawn_JJ commitments_NNS in_IN Note_NN 41_CD on_IN page_NN 178_CD :_: any_DT drawn_VBN amounts_NNS will_MD be_VB included_VBN in_IN loans_NNS and_CC advances_NNS ._.
Under_IN UK_NNP GAAP_NNP ,_, the_DT Group_NNP accounts_NNS for_IN securitisations_NNS of_IN The_DT assets_NNS and_CC liabilities_NNS of_IN the_DT SPVs_NNS are_VBP not_RB recognized_VBN on_IN the_DT assets_NNS originated_VBN by_IN the_DT Group_NNP in_IN accordance_NN with_IN FRS_NNP 5_CD Groups_NNS balance_NN sheet_NN unless_IN the_DT SPV_NNP is_VBZ a_DT quasi-subsidiary_JJ of_IN Reporting_NNP the_DT Substance_NNP of_IN Transactions_NNS ._.
A_DT quasi-subsidiary_JJ is_VBZ defined_VBN in_IN FRS_NNP 5_CD as_IN a_DT derecognised_JJ and_CC a_DT gain_NN or_CC loss_NN on_IN disposal_NN recognized_VBN if_IN all_DT company_NN ,_, trust_NN ,_, partnership_NN or_CC other_JJ vehicle_NN ,_, that_IN ,_, though_IN not_RB significant_JJ rights_NNS or_CC access_NN to_TO benefits_NNS relating_VBG to_TO those_DT assets_NNS fulfilling_VBG the_DT definition_NN of_IN a_DT subsidiary_NN ,_, is_VBZ directly_RB or_CC indirectly_RB and_CC all_DT significant_JJ risks_NNS in_IN those_DT benefits_NNS are_VBP transferred_VBN to_TO controlled_VBN by_IN the_DT reporting_NN entity_NN and_CC gives_VBZ rise_NN to_TO benefits_NNS for_IN others_NNS ._.
In_IN cases_NNS where_WRB there_EX is_VBZ a_DT significant_JJ change_NN in_IN the_DT that_WDT entity_NN that_WDT are_VBP in_IN substance_NN no_DT different_JJ from_IN those_DT that_WDT entitys_VBZ rights_NNS to_TO benefit_VB and_CC exposure_NN to_TO risk_VB ,_, the_DT description_NN or_CC would_MD arise_VB were_VBD the_DT vehicle_NN a_DT subsidiary_NN ._.
monetary_JJ amount_NN relating_VBG to_TO an_DT asset_NN should_MD be_VB changed_VBN and_CC a_DT liability_NN recognized_VBN for_IN any_DT obligation_NN to_TO transfer_VB benefits_NNS that_WDT Following_VBG the_DT issue_NN of_IN FASB_NNP Interpretation_NNP FIN_NNP No._NN ._.
